page.title: 10Public Services & Health
page.content: Virtually all homes are connected to the{electricity grid.}Most homes are on{main sewage,}but some of the more outlying have{septic tank}sewage. { Natural gas mains}are routed through the area, but connection is prohibit- ively expensive to many not close to a main.{Carted coal,oil}and{Calor gas}is an alternativefuel, and{wood-burning} stoves are also popular. {Health}is generally good although local opinion (not medically proven) believes that the incidence of arthritic, and nose and throat complaints to be exceptionally high. This is believed by some to be partly caused by aerial crop spraying, about which there is growing concern.
